desc: Ritter®: Designed to upgrade your 9-5 with comfort, versatility and sustainability. Home of the Rittervest™ & Peter Sweater. Voted the most comfortable, most breathable, and warmest vest for men's business casual needs. Alpaca + Merino Wool. #WooltoTheWise

layout.text: Leaving The Vest Better Than We Found It
Through the practice of good nature and good-natured wool.
